title: Gandel on Scaramucci and Hedge Funds (Audio)
itunes:title: Gandel on Scaramucci and Hedge Funds (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. (Carol Solo) \u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Stephen Gandel\u0010Bloomberg Gadfly Columnist\u0010Bloomberg Editorial\u0010Will discuss Anthony Scaramucci's experience with poor outcomes, along with a look at hedge funds that invest solely in other hedge funds, performing poorly.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
